QuestData.Title: The Twilight Prophet
QuestData.Description: The missive reads as follows:$b$b"The Hour of Twilight is upon us. The world-shaman Thrall approaches Wyrmrest with the Dragon Soul in hand, feebly whimpering one final threat to destroy our glorious master."$b$b"Stop Thrall, and we win our war. I will be watching you from nearby."$b$b ~ The Twilight Prophet
QuestData.LogDescription: Find and unmask the Twilight Prophet.
